overview:
Jon Chamberlin is an entrepreneur and marketer, interested in product psychology.

Contacting patent firms at the age of 14, Jon has been into the development of products, both in the idea and design stage since then. in 2005 he received his first patent pending status. In 2007 he self-published an eBook titled, “How Tasty is Your Soup? The Philosophy of New Weather and the Weather Forecast.”

Launched in March of 2008, Drizzoo was a weather site based on his ideas toward the weather industry. In May of 2011 Jon co-found his second startup with Joey Primiani called Spaces. Spaces is a fun, free and simple way to chat with people around your favorite topics.
